name: Live Messenger – Customer Chat for WordPress
author: Fogm Marketing

sections.description:
Support your customers via Messenger Live Chat. Start conversations on Facebook and continue the same conversation on your website.
Messenger now has over 1 Billion active monthly users and growing. Your customers are on messenger.
They can chat with your Facebook page from your website.

**** ADDED FEATURES *******
* Change the appearance behaviour of your greetings to show, fade Out or not hide.
* Set a delay timer on when you want the greeting message to appear
* Change the color scheme of your chat window to complement your theme
* Change the greeting texts visitors see
* Optional FB App ID not needed now. Easier setup.

This plugin is free and Messenger is free for your business with any free Facebook business page.

  • Answer questions quickly and boost sales while customers are on your website.

  • Get instant notifications from the Messenger App on your phone.

This plugin is very simple but the possibilities are endless.
sections.installation:
Installation Instructions
1. Add the plugin by uploading the zip file or by installing it from the WordPress Plugin reposistory.
2. Activate the plugin and visit Setting > FB Messenger Chat to add your page.
3. Get your Facebook page Id and whitelist your domain name. See Customer Chat Instructions and Tips
4. Bonus Tip – Download the Pages manager app from your app store to chat with customers from your phone.

Thatâ€™s all!

sections.faq:
Do I need a Facebook page to use this plugin?

Yes you do. In order to use messenger, you need to connect and chat from a business page. This is also free to create.

Will this plugin break any other bots I have on Messenger?

  • No this plugin will not break other bots you have setup. This plugin only gives you the messenger chat windown on your website. Your bots will still work even if the customer has this chat window open on your website.
